documentation.text:
@title VoterRegistry
 @dev Manages voter registration, identity verification, and eligibility

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only admin can perform this action"

arguments.value: Only admin can perform this action

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only admin can perform this action"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only verifiers can perform this action"

arguments.value: Only verifiers can perform this action

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only verifiers can perform this action"

documentation.text: @dev Initialize the registry with the admin

@dev Add a verifier who can verify voters
 @param _verifier Address of the verifier

@dev Remove a verifier
 @param _verifier Address of the verifier to remove

@dev Verify a voter's identity (only authorized verifiers)
 @param _voter Address of the voter to verify

@dev Remove a voter from the registry (admin only)
 @param _voter Address of the voter to remove

devdoc.details: Manages voter registration, identity verification, and eligibility

addVerifier(address).details: Add a verifier who can verify voters

constructor.details: Initialize the registry with the admin

returns._0: Whether the voter is registered, verified, and their registration time

isEligible(address).details: Check if a voter is verified and eligible

params._voter: Address of the voter to check

returns._0: Whether the voter is verified and eligible to vote

isRegistered(address).details: Check if a voter is registered

params._voter: Address of the voter to check

params._idHash: Hash of the voter's identification document

params._verifier: Address of the verifier to remove

removeVoter(address).details: Remove a voter from the registry (admin only)

params._voter: Address of the voter to remove

verifyVoter(address).details: Verify a voter's identity (only authorized verifiers)

params._voter: Address of the voter to verify
